section_name.about: I have a passion for social justice through nonprofit work and education and have been in these fields for several years. I decided to shift my focus to Software Development and learned I have a particular knack for front-end development and have been complimented on my eye for design by my supervisor and colleagues. I‚Äôm known to be a ‚ÄúJill of all trades‚Äù, and am extremely interested in picking up iOS development. I am eager to combine these new skills with my previous experience to educate and engage communities to act for the public good through technology. Through my experience, I have witnessed an immense positive impact on societal ecosystems when we improve the ways we connect good people with the right resources and opportunities. I want to continue this mission as I step into a tech industry role.

projects.title: plant.space
projects.description: Backend app that supports an online botanical store and allows customers to shop and place orders, and admins to manage the plant collection and customer orders. Built with Express, Node and AWS using Git, GitHub Projects, and VS Code.

projects.title: City Explorer
projects.description: Search a city and see its map, coordinates, current forecast and associated movies. Built with React, HTML, CSS, and Express using APIs, Git, GitHub, VS Code and Trello

projects.title: My Mixtape
projects.description: Full-stack app that generates music playlists based on simple input measure and allows user to add, delete and annotate the playlist from their own Spotify account. Built with MongoDB, Express, React, Node and CSS using a Spotify API, Git, GitHub Projects, and VS Code.

projects.title: Tarkine
projects.description: An entertaining adventure game that offers interesting, solvable challenges to users. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using Git, GitHub, VS Code, and Figma.
